transcript: if you don't wake up by 5 a.m every day you're gonna be poor if you don't make your bed every day you're going to be poor i have somehow managed to make a million dollars and not i have not made my bed and i have somehow still managed to make money and that sounds crazy making your bed actually has nothing to do with making money because it doesn't mean you're selling more stuff doesn't mean more people are finding out about your stuff it just means you took a sheet and you put it on the top which later you're gonna take back down and get back into i think rather than obsessing about things that don't matter you should focus on the few things that do and do those that one drives me bananas
